hadith.text: It was narrated that Ubayy bin Ka'b said:"The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: 'Allah, the Mighty and Sublime, did not reveal in the Tawrah or the Injil anything like Umm Al-Quran (Al-Fatihah), which is the seven oft-recited, and (Allah said) it is divided between Myself and My slave will have what he asked for
